articles.title: About Me
articles.contents:
Dad. Lousy R coders. Passionate economist. Intrigued by current developments. Worked for several central banks, and cares about growth, inflation and interest rates.
This blog outlines the thinking behind the posts on https://twitter.com/EconomicsShiny. Code for the tweets can be found at https://github.com/pmaier1971/AutomatedEconomicAnalysis.
Note: All posts created with R / RStudio / Distill. Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

articles.title: Economics on Twitter: Why It Matters
